Trade/Device Name(s): Borrelia burgdorferi B31 IgG Line Blot Test Kit
Borrelia burgdorferi IgG B31 Line Blot Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Borrelia burgdorferi B31 IgG Line Blot Test Kit for qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to B. burgdorferi in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to B. burgdorferi sensu stricto (B31) in human serum, intended for samples found positive or equivocal by ELISA or IFA to provide supportive evidence of infection
